## Creating files

* Download llhttp from [https://github.com/nodejs/llhttp](https://github.com/nodejs/llhttp).
* Install all dependencies: **npm -i**
* Build parser files: **npm run-script build**
* Copy these files here:
	* src/native/api.c
	* src/native/http.c
	* build/llhttp.h
	* build/c/llhttp.c
